In this captivating infographic, we delve into the Evolution of Testing, tracing the key milestones, methodologies, and tools that have revolutionized the testing landscape.

excerpt.rendered: The evolution of testing methodologies has been a fascinating journey, driven by the need for efficient and effective ways to ensure the quality of software and digital products. From the early days of manual testing, where every aspect was meticulously checked by human testers, to the rise of automated testing frameworks that brought speed and repeatability to the process, testing has constantly evolved to keep pace with the demands of an ever-changing technology landscape. This infographic is a brief exploration of the key milestones and transformations that have shaped the evolution of testing, showcasing how advancements in types of testing.
